title: Ultra Low Temperature Freezer,Lab Refrigerator And Freezer,Pharmacy Refrigerator Freezer
description: Meling engaged in life science,family health and cold chain solutions since 2002,mainly products including Ultra Low Temperature Freezer,Lab/Medical Refrigerator And Freezer,blood bank refrigerator etc. More info at melingbiomedical.com.
cleaned_text: Leading air cooling performance Energy saving efficiency improved 40%+ Electrical heating door for better anti-condensation effect 7 sensors for high precision of temperature control Intelligent audible and visible alarm system Constant temperature under intelligent control Well-developed audible & visual alarm High-efficiency Freon-free refrigeration Meling Ice Lined Refrigerator with PQS certification 4-digit LED high-brightness digital display Leading air cooling performance Energy saving efficiency improved 40%+ Electrical heating door for better anti-condensation effect 6 sensors for high precision of temperature control Intelligent audible and visible alarm system Caring for life, caring for health. Sailing off for the life science! At Meling, we believe there is a way to create best products. We are obsessively passionate about cryogenic technology, delicate appearance, quality and user friendly. We devote ourselves to be one of the best global innovators in refrigeration solutions for life sciences.
